event.title: 1963, part of Avery's Gore in Franklin County became

data.event: In 1963, part of Avery's Gore in Franklin County became part of Montgomery, with the other section becoming part of Belvidere.

event.title: was granted a charter by the Vermont General Assembly on March 15, 1780

data.event: The Town of Montgomery was granted a charter by the Vermont General Assembly on March 15, 1780.
